dataStatic.description: A bronze statue of the Sunset King. It is rumored to weep real tears when the realm is in danger.

secrets.secret: The 'tears' are an alchemical warning system triggered by detecting necromancy.

dataStatic.description: A thief has hired the party to test the Coin Coster's security... or so they say.
dataStatic.trigger: Approached by a noble dropping a handkerchief with a map inside.

properties.note: Gaunt's Gowns stitches Harper codes into the embroidery of noble outfits.
